description:
Recent detach_volume definition in _ComputeV4Proxy class does not pass the volume_id variable as kwarg.
Due to which RPC dispatch messages fails to receive the volume_id.
rpcapi.py
title: _ComputeV4Proxy detach_volume does not handle kwarg for volume_id

comments.content:
Recent detach_volume definition in _ComputeV4Proxy class does not pass the volume_id variable as kwarg.
Due to which RPC dispatch messages fails to receive the volume_id.
rpcapi.py
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~chhagarw

comments.content: As discussed in IRC, this broke an out of tree decorator which should be using safe_utils.getcallargs to normalize the args/kwargs into a dict like the reverts_task_state decorator. This isn't a bug in nova.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mriedem

comments.content:
Change abandoned by Matt Riedemann (<email address hidden>) on branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/179697
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack
